text: Thank you so much, Dr. Shawn, for your professionalism and gentleness throughout the entire dental procedure. You made the experience comfortable and stress-free considering it's my first time doing crowning/ numbing injection. I truly appreciate your care and expertise!

Dr. Tan Kai Shawn is gentle and nice. He tells me in advance what he will be doing and what i might feel during the treatment, this relieves my anxiety.
I also see him checking in on an elderly personally after the treatment as she was feeling light headed.
The nurse assisting him is also very attentive.
I recommend this dental clinic to anyone who are undecided to which to go to.
This is my second visit after 2 years. I think wasn't attended by Dr Tan then.
After these 2 visits, I can say they are both excellent doctors and I don't regret coming here for dental treatments.

Please take note this clinic does not accept any nets or credit card, ONLY 1 doctor, the reception counter always mess up especially I have been going there since 2011. The medicine is so so and still depend on your diet. Take note for waiting line is very slow. You need to wait . Do not come on Saturdays morning unless you want to seat there for 2 hours .

take note effective 1 july 2022 the clinic open from 9 am - 6 pm on SATURDAYS

take note there will be three dates closing ..

I have already upload the information of closing of the clinic.

please take note the clinic will closing three dates on July , August Sept 2023 , Oct 2023 , Nov 2023

I am very surprised and happy to have found my very own dentist at Nam Seng. Dr Tan JQ Dr. Shawn Tan, and all the staff especially counter ladies was exceptionally helpful. Hv been seeing Dr Koh Eng Kian for many years. I highly recommend him if you hv any Dental oral health problems because he is a very gentle, kind and knowledgeable dentist. His explanation is always clear and when come to treatment I  don't feel any uncomfortable or fear because his hands is very light and he is very careful. The staffs are kind and friendly too.
